Hi, friends! Im [Skibidi Ralia !| create funny videos
with different sound variations. My channel differs from
similar ones in that I create videos with a special approach:

All my video features materials protected by the Fair Use

4 hours to create these videos so that my viewers can feel

created.
The audio and video sources in this video were created in
